mapper.select: SELECT personID, name, img, sex, birthday, birthplace, summary, role FROM persons, relationship WHERE relationship.person_id = persons.personID AND relationship.movie_id = #{id} ORDER BY CASE WHEN role = '演员' THEN 3 WHEN role = '导演' THEN 1 WHEN role = '编剧' THEN 2 END LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset};

SELECT count(*) FROM persons, relationship WHERE relationship.person_id = persons.personID AND relationship.movie_id = #{id} ORDER BY CASE WHEN role = '演员' THEN 3 WHEN role = '导演' THEN 1 WHEN role = '编剧' THEN 2 END;
